clinical_study.official_title: Neurofeedback Training to Restore Hemispheric Imbalance in Dyslexia

lead_sponsor.agency: Catholic University of the Sacred Heart

clinical_study.source: Catholic University of the Sacred Heart

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims at testing a Neurofeedback (NF) training specifically designed for inducing a functional hemispheric imbalance of the tempo-parietal regions in individuals with dyslexia. A randomized clinical trial aimed at comparing two experimental conditions is described: a) Left theta/beta NF training in combination with right beta/theta NF training and b) sham NF training.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of dyslexia or reading performance 2 SD below the norm
- Average intelligence
Exclusion Criteria:
- Psychiatric conditions
- Comorbidity with neurodevelopmental disorders
- Neurological disorders
- Epilepsy
- Enrollment in linguistic or literature university courses
